issue.title: [Python] Add tests for parquet.write_metadata metadata_collector
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8946](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8946). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Follow-up on ARROW-8062: the PR added functionality to `parquet.write_metadata` to pass a a collection of metadata objects to be concatenated. We should add some specific tests for this.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8946?focusedCommentId=17125124) by Francois Saint-Jacques (fsaintjacques):*
